section.title: Technology Requirements
section.p: Part of this course involves teaching you how to use certain calculus tools on a graphing calculator such as a TI-89 or Casio Classpad. You are required to have one and bring it to class everyday. The particular syntax used by these calculators is not important in the grand scheme, but you will need to use something during exams that is not connected to the internet. We know these calculators are capable of doing what is needed.
